sentences.en: ...the dreams of democracy that have so tantalized them.
sentences.cn: …让他们可望而不可及的民主梦想。

sentences.en: Give the dog the bone do not tantalize him.
sentences.cn: 把那块骨头给那条狗吧--别让它干着急了.

sentences.en: Give the dog the bone don't tantalize him.
sentences.cn: 把那块骨头给那条狗吧--别让它乾着急了.

sentences.en: It's not her purpose to tantalize that guy, he is too bananas, not her type.
sentences.cn: 她并非要招惹那男人, 他太疯不是她要的型.

sentences.en: The boy would come into the room and tantalize the dog with his feed.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩会到房间里拿狗食逗弄狗。

sentences.en: These inspiring structures can tantalize and evoke emotions not normally associated with mega structures.
sentences.cn: 与其它大型建筑不同的是,这些令人震撼的设施常让人热血沸腾.

sentences.en: They make use the opportunity and tantalize the appetite by pointing the difficulty of satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 政治家利用别人的匮乏状态,用制造困境来刺激这些人的欲望.

words.tran_cn: 撩人的；逗引性的；干着急的

trans.tran_en: to show or promise something that someone really wants, but then not allow them to have it

trans.tran_cn: 逗弄，引诱，折磨，使干着急
